chunk_index.value: NAME OF THE SEARCH INDEX STORING THE CHUNKED DOCUMENTS - e.g. 'chunk-index'

cosmos_container_name.value: NAME OF THE COSMOS CONTAINER - e.g. 'document-container'

cosmos_database_name.value: NAME OF THE COSMOS DATABASE - e.g. 'document-db'

search_endpoint.value: NAME OF THE SEARCH ENDPOINT - e.g. 'https://SEARCHNAME.search.windows.net'

semantic-config.value: NAME OF THE SEMANTIC CONFIGURATION - e.g. 'semantic-config'

value.category: NAME OF CATEGORY FOR THE GIVEN FOLDER IN THE DOCUMENT LIBRARY - e.g. 'category1'
value.folder: NAME OF THE FOLDER IN THE DOCUMENT LIBRARY - e.g. 'folder1'

sharepoint_site_address.value: NAME OF THE SHAREPOINT SITE - e.g. https://SHAREPOINTNAME.sharepoint.com/sites/SITENAME

storage_account_name.value: NAME OF THE STORAGE ACCOUNT - e.g. 'storageaccountname'
